summary:
**The Elder Scrolls Series**

The Elder Scrolls is a popular video game series with open-world adventures. Developed by Bethesda, it lets players explore the fantasy continent of Tamriel, inspired by medieval times and Roman history. Games like Morrowind, Oblivion, and Skyrim won big awards and sold over 59 million copies.

The series tells stories of heroes fighting evil forces. It includes humans and fantasy races like elves and orcs. There are five main games and some spin-offs. In 2014, a multiplayer game, The Elder Scrolls Online, was also released.
title: The Elder Scrolls
